tika-abh08t47:2_1: Idāni imissāyeva catutthañāṇāya ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā ānubhāvavijānanatthaṁ yena ye dhammā pahātabbā,
tika-abh08t47:2_2: tesaṁ pahānañca abhisamayakāle pariññādikiccāni ca dassetuṁ “etesu yena ye dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
tika-abh08t47:2_6: dukkhena vā sattānaṁ saṁyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena saṁyojanāni.
tika-abh08t47:2_17: Nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato ganthā.
tika-abh08t47:2_22: āgotrabhuto sabbe dhamme byāpetvā pavattantīti attho,
tika-abh08t47:2_24: cakkhādīhi vā saṁvarāsaṁvaradvārehi sattasantāne āsavanti vaṇato yūsāni sandanti viyāti āsavā,
tika-abh08t47:2_25: āsavanti vā etehi cittāni visayesūti āsavā.
tika-abh08t47:2_29: Aniccādidhammasabhāvaṁ atikkamma parato asabhāvato āmasantīti parāmāsā.
tika-abh08t47:2_30: Maṇḍūkaṁ pannago viya ārammaṇaṁ bhusaṁ ādiyantīti upādānāni.
tika-abh08t47:2_31: Appahīnabhāvena sattasantāne anusenti mūsikavisaṁ viya anurūpakāraṇaṁ labhitvā uppajjantīti anusayā.
tika-abh08t47:2_33: Akusalakammāni ca tāni duggatīnaṁ pathā cāti akusalakammapathā.
tika-abh08t47:2_34: Idha pana kammapathabhāvaṁ appattānaṁ taṁsabhāvato gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh08t47:2_37: akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādo.
tika-abh08t47:3_5: Rūpārūpabhavato heṭṭhimakoṭṭhāsabhāvato tatthuppādakilesānaṁ appahīnabhāvena tatiyamaggappattiyā heṭṭhā bhajitabbato vā adhobhāgā,
tika-abh08t47:5_0: Micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhīti tathā pavattānaṁ vitakkavīriyasamādhīnamadhivacanaṁ.
tika-abh08t47:8_0: “Tayo”ti vatthuṁ abhinditvā vuttaṁ, bhinditvā ca pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
tika-abh08t47:9_1: “Idameva saccaṁ moghamañña”nti evaṁ avatthumhi pavatto abhiniveso idaṁsaccābhiniveso.
tika-abh08t47:11_0: Āsavesu kāmarāgabhavarāgā atthato lobhoti dhammato tayo āsavā.
tika-abh08t47:12_1: Te hi ogho viya attani patite apāyasamuddaṁ pāpenti,
tika-abh08t47:12_2: saṁsāradukkhato ca sīsaṁ ukkhipituṁ na denti,
tika-abh08t47:14_0: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena sattasantāne anusentīti anusayā.
tika-abh08t47:14_5: thāmagamanañca nesaṁ aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t47:14_6: Tathā hi dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena imeyeva anusayā vuttā,
tika-abh08t47:14_9: Apare pana “kāmarāgassa anusayo”tiādinibbacanaṁ vatvā kāmarāgādīnaṁ bījabhūtā attabhāvassa kilesasambhūtā kilesuppādanasatti anusayāti vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh08t47:15_3: Tasmiṁ pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-abh08t47:15_6: Abhūtaṁ vatthuṁ bhūtato paraṁ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
tika-abh08t47:15_14: So pana parehi gahiteyeva kammapatho hoti.
tika-abh08t47:15_15: “Aho vatedaṁ mama hotū”ti evaṁ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā abhijjhā.
tika-abh08t47:15_16: “Aho vatāyaṁ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṁ manopadosalakkhaṇo byāpādo.
tika-abh08t47:16_9: Mahāsāvajjaappasāvajjappayogādibhedo pana tattha tattha vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t47:19_0: Yattha yattha pana eva-saddena avadhāraṇaṁ akatvā yaṁ yaṁ dutiyañāṇavajjhanti vā tatiyañāṇavajjhanti vā catutthañāṇavajjhanti vā vakkhati,
tika-abh08t47:19_1: tattha tattha so so purimañāṇehi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t47:23_2: Yaṁ pana “kukkuccapakatatāya āpattiṁ āpajjatī”ti vuttaṁ kukkuccaṁ,
tika-abh08t47:23_3: taṁ sandhāya “kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī”ti dhammasaṅgaṇīaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ,
tika-abh08t47:23_4: tasmā dvinnaṁ vacanānaṁ ayaṁ adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t47:23_7: Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṁ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t47:23_8: Yaṁ pana arahato uppajjamānaṁ “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṁ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjitunti
tika-abh08t47:23_12: nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṁ pana kappatīti vīmaṁsanabhūtaṁ vinayakukkuccaṁ nāma,
tika-abh08t47:26_1: Kiṁ panetāni ete dhamme ghātentāni atītānāgate ghātenti,
tika-abh08t47:26_8: tathāpi aphalo vāyāmena saddhiṁ pahātabbānaṁ atthitāya.
tika-abh08t47:26_12: ye pana maggena asamugghāṭitattā kāraṇalābhe sati avassaṁ uppajjanārahā kilesā,
tika-abh08t47:26_13: te attano uppattiyā anuppattidhammataṁ āpādentāni etāni te anāgate ghātenti nāma.
tika-abh08t47:28_2: kathaṁ nāma ekekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni sambhavanti.
tika-abh08t47:28_3: Na hi tādisaṁ kiñci loke diṭṭhaṁ atthi,
tika-abh08t47:28_4: na ca vacanaṁ labbhatīti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya tesaṁ jānanavidhiṁ upamāvasena tāva dassetuṁ “padīpo hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t47:29_6: Tañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṁ viddhaṁsentaṁ attanipi sammohaṁ viddhaṁsetiyeva.
tika-abh08t47:29_9: “Nirodhaṁ sacchikarotī”ti nirodhasaccamekaṁ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena maggañāṇaṁ paṭivijjhati.
tika-abh08t47:30_0: Evaṁ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṁ ekapaṭivedhaṁ āgamenapi sādhetuṁ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t47:30_1: Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti hi “yo nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh08t47:30_7: Aññathā kamābhisamaye sati purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādipassato dukkhādidassanaṁ puna avattabbaṁ siyā.
tika-abh08t47:30_12: tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā,
tika-abh08t47:30_13: tathā tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṁ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā kāraṇūpacārena vuttā.
tika-abh08t47:32_3: ettāvatā paññābhāvanāya nānākilesaviddhaṁsanavasappavatto ānisaṁso dassito hotīti.
tika-abh08t47:33_2: “ariyaphalasamāpattī”ti hi catunnampi phalaṭṭhānaṁ attano attano ariyaphalassa diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ nirodhe appanā.
tika-abh08t47:33_3: Cattāropi hi ariyapuggalā sakaṁ sakaṁ phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t47:33_4: Keci pana “anāgāmiarahantova samāpajjanti samādhismiṁ paripūrakāritāyā”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t47:33_5: taṁ akāraṇaṁ attanā paṭiladdhasamāpattisamāpajjane samādhismiṁ paripūrakāritāya kātabbābhāvato.
tika-abh08t47:33_6: Sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa hi puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṁ labbhati,
tika-abh08t47:33_8: Uparimā pana heṭṭhimaṁ pubbe paṭiladdhampi na samāpajjanti puggalantarabhāvaṁ upagatattā.
tika-abh08t47:33_11: anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṁ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hotīti tassa tassa ariyassa taṁ taṁ phalaṁ bhavaṅgasadisaṁ hoti,
tika-abh08t47:33_12: tasmā puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā natthi uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṁ,
tika-abh08t47:33_13: heṭṭhimo pana uparimaṁ na samāpajjati anadhigatattāti cattāropi puggalā sakasakaphalameva samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t47:33_14: Taṁ pana samāpajjitukāmena ariyasāvakena rahogatena paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā.
tika-abh08t47:33_15: Tassa pavattānupubbavipassanassa saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṁ phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṁ appeti.
tika-abh08t47:33_16: Phalasamāpattininnacittatāya cettha sekhassa phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
tika-abh08t47:34_0: Tathā hi ariyamaggavīthiyaṁ anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṁ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṁ sātisayaṁ padālanena
tika-abh08t47:34_2: phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṁ tesaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā kilesavikkhambhane
tika-abh08t47:34_3: nirussukkāni kevalaṁ ariyānaṁ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammappattāni hutvā uppajjantīti
tika-abh08t47:34_5: Yato nesaṁ pacchimo saṅkhāranimittato vuṭṭhahitvā maggassa anantarapaccayo bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t47:34_6: teneva ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayabhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hoti,
tika-abh08t47:34_8: Pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena cassā pabandhavasena pavattiparicchinnakālāpagame bhavaṅgavasena tato vuṭṭhānañca veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh08t47:35_0: Nirodhasamāpatti pana tatiyacatutthaphalaṭṭhānaṁ anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ appavatti.
tika-abh08t47:35_1: Anāgāmiarahantoyeva hi kāmacchandādisamucchindanena samādhismiṁ paripūrakāritāya samathaphalasamannāgatattā nirodhaṁ samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t47:35_2: Tathā hetaṁ samathavipassanānaṁ yuganandhabhāvappavattanavasena dvīhi balehi samannāgatasseva sambhavati,
tika-abh08t47:35_4: khīṇāsavena vā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinā rahogatena paṭisallīnena paṭhamajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha
tika-abh08t47:35_6: tato dutiyaṁ tatiyaṁ catutthaṁ ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva tattha saṅkhārā sammasitabbā,
tika-abh08t47:35_7: atha ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhāvikopanaṁ saṅghapaṭimānanaṁ satthupakkosanaṁ addhānaparicchedoti
tika-abh08t47:36_0: Tattha sarīrato visaṁyuttā mañcapīṭhādayo sattāhabbhantare yathā na nassanti,
tika-abh08t47:36_3: Saṅgho pana ñattikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṁ kattukāmo “yāva maṁ na pakkosati,
tika-abh08t47:36_5: Satthā ca “sikkhāpadapaññāpanādīsu yāva maṁ na pakkosati,
tika-abh08t47:36_9: Athekaṁ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti,
tika-abh08t47:36_11: tato yathāparicchedaṁ tatiyacatutthaphalānaṁ aññatarena nirodhā vuṭṭhahissatīti.
tika-abh08t47:37_9: Aviggahakampadanti viggahañca kampañca na detīti aviggahakampadanti attho.
